content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back watching the stars when three flying v's flew across the sky. there was 5 objects in each v and one on each side. me and a buddy had seen jus one fly across the sky eight years before. there was no noise. they looked like gray cotton balls or turned out light bulbs, they wernt that noticable like everyone said a ufo claims to be. as they came more into view i thought it was fog or a cloud but you could see each object by itself. as it got over a large pond a few yards away then they came into a giant tight circle where they seemed to vibrate or wobble, but you could still see each circle, they mite have been going up or down im not to sure but it was suprizing how cordinated they were and that they didnt hit each other. i wanted someone to see this so i ran inside to get someone but when i came back they were gone so i have no clue where they went or how they left from there. it scared the crap out of me and now i dont look at the stars like i used to.
content.summary: 15-17 circles come across sky and stop.

content.detailedDescription: I have a rar 3d view-master pix of neil armstrong taking pix on the moon but in the backgrond it apers to be a ufo that thay did not block it out.The view-master set is made by gaf a step into the universe.It is a clame that a ufo seen the astronauts on the moon!
content.summary: Ufo on the moon.

content.detailedDescription: I need to see a feild investigator ...I have the actual dvd of the event..I am a park manager and my tenant bought this to me ....If you want actual information you need to come see it and talk to him before he leaves my park ...He is here working on a hotel being built and will be leaving soon...Please just come and see this for yourself!!!
content.summary: Wow.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home on the freeway i'5 from tacoma wash. going north at 1:30 in the am,march 21st sunday morning  about 6 miles from the south center mall exit, my husband was driving and over to the left over the trees about 10 miles away we noticed falling from the sky vary vary fast shooting straight down a vary bright ice blue/white maybe the size of a volkswagen car u.F.O.We were both screaming oh my god do you see that!! then it was gone, my daughter was in the back seat and are screaming woke her, she didn't see it,i called my mom and uncle & told them what we saw,  we were talking about it all the way home, when we got to exit 7 just before the newcastle exit, at 1:45 we saw on the side of the freeway going south lined up about 5 army trucks 1 lane was shut down and a army helicopter hovering over head, we were so excited, and nervous, and we will never forget it.
content.summary: Brightest light i have ever seen white/ ice blue.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving west on i 94 in jackson last night at approx, 10:15.As we apprached the exit ramp onto airport rd we saw three spectacular flashesof a white silvery light. the lights lasted approx,3 to 4 seconds and as each light blinked out it would reappear in a different location going up and down and side to side as the lights were heading in an easterly direction. as we looked back in just a mill second the light s just shot off and dissappeared.Me and my dauughter, just looked at each other as if we had seen a ghost and were pretty shook up at what we had just wittnessed.
content.summary: Driving west on i 94 in jackson mi saw 3 quick flashes of a spectacular light.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home driving down i 35 heading southbound towards temple from waco. my wife pointed to a strange light in the sky moving at incredible speed. it suddenly stopped on a dime over a field about a mile or so off the highway. i pulled my car to the shoulder as we were wondering what it was. suddenly is appeared to land in the field and when it did we could make out a disk shape but due to the darkness it was hard to tell exactly. it was a cloudy night. i pulled my binoculars out of the back seat and when i focused in i saw what did indeed appear to be a saucer like object on the ground. i at first dismissed this as a feeder for livestock due to my poor visibility and it being a farmers field with livestock. i soon realised this object had what appeared to be a door of somesort that opened up and a redish orange light could be seen when it opened from what appeared to be the interior. then suddenly it appeared 3 men walked out of the craft and the door shut. the craft then after about 3 minutes rose upward hovered for a brief time then took off northbound at a very high rate of speed and i lost sight. i then refocused on the field to see if i could see any one or any thing in the field but visibility was very poor. i did note to my wife that they appeared to be walking in the direction af a rest stop that was just off of the field near the high way. i wanted to make a u turn and go northbound and stop at the rest stop but my wife wouldnt let me, she was getting concerned that maybe it could be aliens. i have lived in the area 35 years and never have seen anything like this. we do live near fort hood but the military to my knowledge does not have anything disk shaped in it's arsenal. i never regained sight of the 3 figures but they did leave the craft and my wife refused to stick around for it's return if it did come back at all.
content.summary: Disk shape craft descended into field near lorena, texas.

content.detailedDescription: Due to threats on my life i can not reveal the location of this sighting.  suffice it to say it was on a millitary base in the west desert.My crew and myself saw it rise up from behind a ridge of mountains west of our observation point. it was first thought to be a flare but it was too big and there was no smoke coming off it. it was also the wrong color. most flares are yellow,orange and from wherenwe were we alsocould not see a parachute on it either. we were equipped with high power field glasses and a b.C. scope and were only about 2000 meters from the mountain ridge,so we could see it very well. it was a brilliant blue color almost as intence as an arc welders arc when he is welding.The shape was like an almond on its side and as near as we could tell it was about 100 feet long. ithovered about 500 feet above the ridge for about 15 to 20 minutes then it did the strangest thing. it dimmed so much yyou could hardly see it then reappeared down range about 25 miles and re appeared. it was almost like it moved with out moving for lack of a better discription. then it went slowly down behind the ridge out of sight.When i reported the incident to range control there was suddenly a new voice on the radio telling me to report to the provost marshalls offiec a.S.A.P. when i arrived i was hand cuffed and taken into a back office. there i was informed by a two star general and two gentle men in black suits that i was to keep my mouth shut about what i saw and that if i said anything toanyone about the incident that it is a big desert out there and it would take a long time for anyone to find my body. i am taking a huge risk reporting this but i am retired now and i feel that someone should know what is going on.
content.summary: Strange air craft at millitary post.

content.detailedDescription:
En realidad historia no hay, ya que revisan los videos y mirando un programa sobre ufo, note algo raro o un punto en forma de disco, le comente a mi familia yo estaba de vacaciones y lo tomaran algo inusual, el video del celular no se notaba bien por la pantalla peque���a y me tome la molestia de descargarlo a mi computadora pasados los dias y mirarlo bien con el zoom y despacio. mi sorpresa fue que era de color plata, bien forma de disco con las caracteristas de ovni.

1r= estaba mirando pasar un desfile de caballos, en la puerta de la casa.

2r= .

3r= forma extra���a en el video.

4r= forma de platillo voloador, estatico.

5r= nada.

mando esto para que lo puedan analisar, y si es en verdad un objeto. esperando repuestas de ustedes.

gracias!!
content.summary: Objeto volador estatico de color plata.

content.detailedDescription: It was august 3 of 2008 at 14:08, i was at my aunt's house at about 10 miles from the volcano, i was staring at the volcano to see the panorama, then i noticewd something strange going up and down, side to side, even hid behid the volcano, since i believe in aliens and ufo's i thought it was a ufo, and i think it wasn't my first sighting, so i got excited and tried to take evidence from it, i tried to photograph it with my phone but the zoom was too little so i went looking for my aunts camera but she had hid the batteries and i couldn't find them, i was afraid it would leave; it took me about 10 minutes to find the batteries and i went to the window but i couldn't see it until, in a suprise had hidden behind the mountain and i took 12 images and 2 videos with her samsung s630 and for my suprise it had stayed for about 3 hours i think, since i dont think it was there from the beginning, in the proximity of the volcano, i just told my mother and my cousin about this and i dont know who else saw it; i always have believed in ufo's and had a lot of experiences but this one i have proof, i don't know if there were any planes or helicopter there but i dont think any helicopter or plane can rise at that much speed and steer so sharply or even have that shape, since also i play flight simulators and know the planes movements and aerodinamycs. i was thankful that it lasted so long, but i don't know how much it lasted, it kept going after i stopped the photos and the videos and i lost sight when i came back to my house and downloaded the photos, i came to my aunt's house on the night and it wasn't there, the camera's time is wrong.
content.summary: Ufo over quezaltepec volcano, san salvador, el salvador.

content.detailedDescription: I was out that night taking photos and noticed a fuzzy yellow object like a comet in the southeastern sky.  these were very hard to see with the naked eye. i started taking photos and saw these objects show up in better detail. my eyes could have been deceiving me.  i do not know if they are lens flares or not, but i am being told by david sereda and other optical specialists that these are not lens flares, but i am not convinced.  since mufon is working with another agency now, it might be worth taking a look at possibly.  i notice things on these photos like possible aircraft wings (?), evidence of heat being released, plasma (?)  it is really hard to say.  these objects were all over the place, in the eastern to southeastern sky up to five to six objects at a time.  very interesting.
content.summary: I was out taking photos and noticed a fuzzy object like a comet and started taking photos of it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was first to notice lights from back porch, mentioning to guests.

the lights looked like large airplane landing lights, but stationary.They were of whitish pale yellow in color. if they were aircraft lights they had to be from helios. i would gustimate the altitude at 400'-600' agl.

 at first they were all  in a horizontal line. the far right light  gained altitude followed by the nearest light which stationed next to the first light.  of the remaining two lights, one rose in altitude but not as far as the other two and then came down to its original position.

the higher two lights came down and again formed a horizontal line with the other lights.
slowly all four lights decended to where they were obscured by distant tree line. the size of the lights did not get smaller as they decended.

we estimate the lights were visable for a minimum of 5 minutes.Long enough we went off the porch and stood in the yard watching.

two points of reference i was able to use were #1....Beacon on top of water tower in eagle lake, #2...The aforementioned tree line which is across the small lake we live on.

there is an operational airport located near my residence, bartow (kbow) (a former wwii training field)

the next day after digesting what we had seen the night before i discounted the lights were from helios.Especially after googling and extrapolating water tower,the tree line our residence location and bartow airport. the area where the lights decended is far removed from the eastern runway at kbow

in late dec(2008) or early jan(2009) while fishing at night(abt 10pm) i observed at least 5 lights ( small yellowish orange colored) in general vicinity of original sightings,though further to the west. these lights formed a verticle semi  arch with the bottom ascending to the to top and then disapperaing. these light were only visable for mere seconds.
content.summary: 4-5 lights observed by myself, girlfiend and a married couple.

content.detailedDescription: See attachment.
content.summary: Rectangular object with rows of amber lights on bottom with center structure. humming sound. low altitude. zig zag movements in distance.

content.detailedDescription: In april of 1977 my dad asked me if i could attend a family reunion in the state of wyoming. i told my dad that i was scheduled for a three week vacation starting may 1st and would make it. i worked at a local prison and attended college. my step sister was in the army and had told me about the reunion plans a week before, so when dad talked about the reunion she told him that she could'nt make the reunion and set in motion a plan to surprise our parents. on may 4, 1977, at about 10am i left san luis obispo ca traviling across california into nevada and to winnamucca nv. i reached winnamucca around 7:30ish, stopped for fast food and gas. i took hgw 95n and this is when my life changed for ever and i know that we are not alone in the universe. i drove north on 95 for about 15 to 20 minutes. when reaching for my drink in a drink container, i noticed a cigar shapped light from my right rear window. the light seem to be following the horizon of the mountains and at first i thought it was the beam of light from car driving on a mountain top road. as it was behind me to my right and far behind i continued driving and eating. as i drove on i noticed the light move to a more parellel but still behind  position. that's when i noticed that something was different about this light. i slowed my car down and pulled over to the side of the road, stopped and got out of my car and watched in amazement and the light slowed down to a stop just before a saddle in the mountain, then it slowly moved over the saddle, stopped again, then left with a burst of speed nothing on this earth could match. i want to tell your organizationh before i die that i saw a vehicle from another planet and it is real. i continued on to boise id. picked my sister up at the boise air port, and we went on to baker oregon. when we got home, around noon, i learned that my dad was called to work at 3am (pacific bell) and had to fix fuses along oregons souther telephone power grid.I've seen these fuses, about the size of a nerf football. when he got home that after noon we had dinner and he explaned that an unusual power serge had blown out telephone fuses onlong a three hundred mile line and burnt out several fuses. he said that it happened around 8:30pm the previous night. i talked to my dad privately about what i saw while driving thru nevada and after the usual question about drugs and booze, he laughed and told me to drop it and not mention it again to anyone in the family. he worried that i would be called a nut case.  will it's 2009, ufo programs are all over the tv, and i just want the world to know what i saw just out side of winnamucca nv. in 1977, god as my witness. d.L. kenney
content.summary: Stopped car along hwy 95, maybe 15 min out of winnamucca nv. to observe light in shape of cigar.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, daughter, son, mom, and i  were trick or treating in a large group when around 6:30-7:00 a woman in our pack said "oh, how pretty a shooting star." i looked up and saw a solid and stright bright silver line or ribbon.(the only way i can explain it) i said to the woman, "that's no shooting star." from where i was standing (obviously on the ground), if i measured it with extended arms, it was probably about 3 feet long and 1 foot thick. we watched it for about 1-2 minutes and then it just faded. we continued trick or treating, but i keopt looking at the sky hoping to see it again. approximately 20 minutes later we all saw a orangish - red orb moving with no sound and swiftly from the south to north. it almost looked on fire. i can not tell you how high it was flying, but it was more than just a light. i could actually make out the shape and it was an orb. it appeared to be solid on the top and bottom, and the light came from the middle. i have never seen anything like it. i tried to capture its image on my cell phone, but i could not get it to function. we watched it go and then fade away.
 i was not a believer in ufos, but that night changed my mind. i began to watch ufo hunters and sure enough another sighting that occured on oct. 31st happened in tinley park a few years ago. i was really confused for a few days, but came to realize that yes i had indeed seen an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Silver ribbon/red orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi 

4 years ago i was shooting pictures to my cats, when a i load the photos in the  computer i watch 2 strangers objetcs in one photo. i never saw nothing in the sky when i shooting.

i send you the original photo and another with the color negative.

i hope you can help me know what is that in the picture.

thank.
content.summary: Two strange objects appears in my photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed down interstate 95 towards orlando  when i saw a large craft just sitting in the sky with different colors and different lighting patterns underneath. i scanned the sky to see if there were more.  i then saw  three seperate  small  lights/orbs  .  the fronts of these three circles starting pulsating and reminded me of a jellyfish.   the highway was loaded with cars and yet nobody slowed down or stopped (myself included) to get a better look or take pictures.  my  thoughts  were, this was some kind of stunt because the large ship reminded me of an episode of star trek classic where a klingon or was it romulan vessel decloaked,and that  is  what this circle (underneath) looked like.  i just kept driving down interstate 95.
content.summary: One larger ufo  with three smaller ufos  about  1/4  mile  in front

content.detailedDescription:
I was in napier, hawkes bay, north island of new zealand, visiting and having dinner at a friends house with my 4yr old son and two other people.

as we left the house we all walked down the driveway towards our vehicles then we noticed a bright white light ascending from behind the house across the road.  it was as big as a large car.  there was no noticable noise coming from the object.  it was a still, quiet slightly overcast evening.  the object seemed to be silent as it ascended into the sky.

we all watched the object for about 20-30 seconds trying to comprehend what the object was.  my thoughts at first were that it could have been a low flying plane or helicopter but then realised there was no sound associated with these aircraft.  

there was an airplane visible in the sky at the time of us sighting this other object.  as we were watching the object the neighbours across the road arrived home and parked on their driveway.  

as we watched the object we overheard the occupants of the car across the road say something like " what's that light in the sky".  

it was that remark that prompted me to go to my car and get the video camera.

by the time i had the camera turned on the light looked like a star in the sky.  i then began to video the object using normal shot on the camera only zooming in on it once or twice which is noticable when played back.

the object moved eratically in the sky and seemed to change colour from white to orange, green, red and purple.  it also seemed to change shapes from round to oval and cigar and even looked as if it split in two as it changed direction at high speeds, looking at it through the camera lense.

the object appeared to fly downwards toward the camera in a roller coaster fashion up and down, this is also very noticable in the footage.  then it seemed to retreat higher in the sky as it got smaller.

i managed to get approximately three and a half minutes of footage of the object before it zig zagged across the sky rapidly, reducing in size and faded from view in an upward direction.

part way through videoing the object one of the witnesses left.  this is clearly heard on the audio of the video.  when the object disappeared the rest of us went our separate ways.

i took the video home and put it onto a dvd.  i am hoping to find an organisation that can help me get the footage analyzed to determine what the object could be.

due to the nature of the movements of the object i firmly believe that it is an unidentified flying object and that no aircraft known to man could move at speeds such as this did.  

i also realise that sceptics may put the eratic movements of the object down to camera shake and movement of the camera, but if watched closely it is noticable that the camera is very steady and that the camera would have to be moved very fast at different angles for the object to achieve such movement, which i believe to be impossible.

it would be very interesting to find someone with the expertise to analyze this footage to determine that the object is in fact flying in this manner and that it is not due to camera movement.

if you can help please contact me.

chris lawson
new zealand
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,  Circle,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: Bright light, changed colours and shapes, moved eratically very fast in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Mi profecion es conductor de un taxi en tijuana b.C,normalmente llevo conmigo una camara (kodak easyshare c875).Me encontraba esperando clientes en la calle de la nieve,esquina con paseo playas,cuando se vio frente al sitio donde me encontraba(plaza monumental),el helicoptero (u.S.A.)de la cuardia costera que realizaba labores de vigilancia por la zona como casi todos los dias,me pregunto������un arquitecto que se encontraba en el lugar que por que tomaba tantas fotos,pues me habia visto varias veces tomando fotos,le conteste que tomaba fotos de ovnis y enseguida tome una secuencia de fotos(rafaga) al helicoptero (en ningun momento vi el ovni que se aprecia en segundo plano) y procedi a revizar las tomas,dandome cuenta que se observaba algo junto al helicoptero,mostrandoselo al arquitecto.
me parecio tan buena la foto,que la pase a mi telefono celular
(sony eriksson p1i) y con el programa de edicion que viene con el telefono,filtre la imagen y el resultado me parecio sorprendente.
 para mas informacion me pongo a sus ordenes
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Viendo el helicoptero de la guardia costera ,vigilando le tome rafaga de 3 fotos  pero no vi al objeto

content.detailedDescription: I dont know if i saw a ufo but i want mufon analize the pictures that i will send you, it was taken on the airplane on nevada sky, i was taking pictures threw the airplane window and two objects where on the photos and i dont know if the two objects are airplanes and if it is normal that others airplanes can fly so near of us, can you help me please, thank you for your time.
content.summary: Airplane

content.detailedDescription: Estava deitado vendo televisao, quamdo notei pela  janela do meu quarto, uma esfera brilhante localizada  proximo ao morro. ela estava acima das residencias e locais habitados, onde  nao  existem redes eletricas ou qualquer fonte  de  energia. piscava  intermitantemente e alterava sua posi���ao com rapidez e chegava a ficar segundos desaparecida e  voltava sempre alterando a sua incandecencia. fiquei surpreso durante um tempo e  por  morar a  23 anos  no  mesmo  local  tinha certeza  de  nao  haver  luzes  naquele  exato   local meu  filhoe  e  minha  esposa  viram  tambem.E  acompanhamos  por   2   horas  aproximadamente ate desaparecer sem  deixar rastros vale a pena  dizer  que  apareceu por  mais 2  dias   da  mesma semana .Ha tambem no  youtube  um  video  gravado  por  um  morador  proximo a  minha  residencia  tente  localizar   com o titulo  ovini_santos .Enviei  este  documento  apos  ter  assistido  o  programa a seu  respeito na discovery channel agrade���o  desde  ja   a  sua aten���ao e  solicito um  retorno se  possivel
content.summary: Esfera com luz forte intermitente.

content.detailedDescription: In this one event of the many i've had with these objects i was in my 2nd floor bathroom looking out and up expeting to see one as i do occasionaly see when it is a clear and sunny day i would first notice a flash and see it as a tiny round ball moving across the sky silvery and sometimes white. it is very difficult to see them and i would have to squint my eyes to look and track them again. i think the flash is the sun reflecting off of it or it does it on purpose to get me to see again. you would think it would be a regular party balloon at first but... i dont know of many balloons that stay in place in the sky with a strong gust of wind. as i said before this not my first encounter. my first was in mid-november (cant remember the date) 2005 it was a warm overcast day i was taking the family rabbit out to play outside the backyard just looking up at the swirling dark clouds when i was looking towards the north and i noticed a single engine plane going west then something behind it at first it just stood still as the plane kept moving and then slowly moved from north to south until it was almost over me it was maybe 200 feet above right under the clouds small flat 3 pink triangles looking smooth and or glowing pointing south, east and west with an orange circle in the middle fussy looking did not seem to have anything attaching the four objects probably because the craft was cloacked but i did see what looked like heat or exhaust coming from behind it blowing north i moved right under it and i noticed some activity from the orange circle russling after watching it for a few mintutes i did not know what to make of it so i just went back in my house. the next day i notice the spot where i was under it the grass grew high and right around it was yellow ever since then i've seen many object mostly like the one at the top and i know its not a hullucenation because sometimes other people would also see them too cant take pictures camera cant pick them but i really dont whant to involved with this kind of stuff anyway sorry.
content.summary: Star like, very small, very far away, moving and sometimes still.

content.detailedDescription:
i was out in the pines with my hound, blue, and we was hunting us some possum when i saws this here light comming real fast through them trees over by chickenfarms and it was like so bright i thuoght it was like a plan gonn
crash in.  but then i saw it go sideyways reel fast and when it cross my front blue he started howling like crazy.  it movedd fast as buckshot 
but did no spin no nothing just strait.  i like to shoot it but i knews it was no good.Onse it got over the chickenfarms i herd lod squawking like you know they going nuts and then this thing it go strait up and was real gone.
man i was so scare and so was blue he wimpered all the way home and then i told my wife and she sed she saw lights to.  we loccked up the trailer and
let blue sleep on the bed and he kept wimper.  it weren't no joke.
content.summary: Bright saucer, real big, fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday march 21rst,at about 4:30 to 4:35 p.M. decided to try to retrieve golf balls that i knew i had sliced off into the field in question the balls had been there since last fall but are hard to find due to the fact our field in this county (are no till)after finding four golf balls and knowing there were more i ventured some where 110 feet further back into the field came across a 12 foot in diameter circle.
i returned home grabbed my sony handy cam and returned to the location of the circle photographed and and took video of the said circle i returned to the area around 5:00 p.M. after inspecting it to be sure i wasn't just seeing what i wanted to see or that it might be something explainable i returned home showed the photo's to my mother,she then proceeds to tell me she could swear she saw something strange in the sky to the north west of our home in the sky i can not on the other hand confirm this myself(in other word i did not see this object).
after reviewing the photo's and video clips i called a close friend told him i had found something i wanted to get his opinion at about seven thirty we left my home headed to the site i waited to discus the situation with him until we arrived we took more video measured the area and took soil samples while taking video for evidence one sample within the circular pattern and one soil sample from just outside.
the circular pattern was completely dry while outside of it was damp or moist this is visible in one of my photo's that i will attach to this report it looked as if someone lay a a round pattern on the ground and dried the inner part with a hair drier making a perfect dry pattern in the end.
there is a pile of dead corn stalks and bean stalks inside the circle that seem to show evidence of a swirl pattern (not well defined but seems to be a slight swirl)to the outer part of the circle the story is different there's an inch or more of plant matter that has been moved in what looks to be an evident swirl pattern around said area,there is more but i'm out of room here,we returned on the 22nd with metal detector compass and a stud finder to test for anything abnormal we got nothing with the metal detector or compass the stud finder on the other hand acted strange which i did not expect and this means nothing to me it was just an idea and these items were all we had to investigate with.
if there is anything that you may want to know further you are welcome to contact me though i do not want to be hounded by outside sources other than mufon,and or mufon investigators in short what i'm saying here is that i don't desire having government officials pulling into my drive way thinking their going to take my camera because i stumbled into something that i may have not been meant to see,so i'm opting the circle below to not have any other person other than a mufon rep or investigator to have my contact info and would be glad to answer any questions just look at the pictures below and tell me is this normal?
content.summary: Don't know if its a landing site sure looks this way?

content.detailedDescription:
Upon waking up on the morning of march 12, 2009, i went out on my balcony to have a cigarette.  i live in darmouth nova scotia and i always look to the west, appreciating the beauty of halifax harbour in the morning.  the sun was rising and the sky in the east was a light blue and the sky in the west was a darker blue.  minimal clouds, i do not recall any wind either.  when i noticed 7 or 8 lights in the west well above the horizon.  they simply looked like stars, but it was too light out and i did not see any other stars in the sky.  the lights formed absolutley no pattern or shape but they would move at mind boggling speeds left and right up and down.  sometimes they would kind of fade out then show up again very bright.  i did not count more than 8 but there could have been more.  i stood on my balcony in awe watching these things for a bout 1 minute before i realized i have to tell my girlfriend before she leaves for work.  when she came out to look, literally a few seconds after i called to her, there was a patch of clouds moving in from the right moving left and they blocked the view, she had to catch the bus so she never witnessed them.  i wanted to just stay on my balcony all day and watch these things, but i had to get ready for work.  after my shower i came outside again and they were still there.  the cloud cover was well gone by now and i could see them just as plain as i had almost 20 minutes ago.  

and that's all.  i have made a call environment canada but they forwarded me to an astonomy dept. at a local university, but i have had no response yet.
i wlil keep you informed of any updates.


jason muise
content.summary: Having a smoke on my balcony at 7am looking to the west were 7 or 8 very bright lights (about star size) moving left right up down, high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the taylor fireworks, last yr 2008 when i just got the urge to look up being a paranormal investigator when i get the urge to do something i do it. well i looked up to my right slightly behind me and i noticed two lights floating up in the sky pretty high up. at frist i thought nothing of it but couldent seem to stop looking up, about 2 mins in i noticed they were not moving, thats when i told the people i was with to take a look up there and tell me what they think they saw. we all agreed these objects were not moving. about 10 mins later with us still watching one just dissapeared. then the other light about 3 mins after that slowly faded away kinda like a light bulb does when its about to die, but the object was also moving up.

now that night when i arrived home my mother who was also at the fireworks but not anywhere near us started to say " did you see..." i cut her off and said the two lights in the sky, we both froze she had also seen the lights and told me the same thing to the tee as to what i saw.

ive also asked a few co workers about this and they also seen the event, has anyone else seen or heard about this?
content.summary: Seen something in the skys in taylor.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime during the first two weeks of august in 2009 between 9 pm and 9:45 pm, an extremely fast, pulsating orange orb was seen at 30 degrees above the horizon straight west from my backyard in plainfield moving with incredible speed in a northeasterly manner.  the orb pulsated with a reddish-orange color and did not lose altitude nor break up at any time. skies were 25% overcast with cumulus clouds to the west.  it is interesting to note that the pulsating light had a long frequency of about 10 seconds that never changed.  the speed was so fast that if i went into the house for a camera i would have lost sight of it.  i watched it till it disappeared to the north. also, planes on approach to o'hare airport turn to line up with the runway.  their average speed appears to be at least 150 mph and it looks like they're crawling. so the speed of the orb seemed to move at least 950 mph.  there was no sonic boom or any kind of noise.  the object appeared to be moving from yorkville and to over carol stream.
content.summary: Pulsating reddish-orange orb moving extremely fast in a northeasterly fashion.

content.detailedDescription: I was in amsterdam, just taking a photo of the city. at the time , i didn't see anything in the sky. at about 5 seconds later, i took another photo at the same place. i checked both photos and realised that on one photo was a sphere object and on the other photo was nothing. the object disappeard immediately. i was amazed by this but very happy.
content.summary: A sphere object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from a private party in atlanta to my home in rome,ga. i have to take 75 north to highway 41 in carterville then highway 411 to rome.
at the party i had no alcohol i was alert no fatigue at all. in between kingston in bartow county and the floyd county i noticed yellow light i want to say it was circular in shape. i was there a few momments and then it accelerated to an amazing speed and disappear. i told my grandmother what i saw and she said people had been calling from cartersville to the local radio station talking of the event

the object accleration was amazing. within 3 seconds of its acceleration the object was out of view.

i thought the object was helicopter or a plane at first but the acceleration and the object was low in altitude. once it accelerated i knew it couldnt be either or.

i felt a since of relief cause i knew it couldnt possibly from this world. i wondered if we were alone. this possibly proved to me we aren't
content.summary: Strange yellow light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for a moment and like i normaly do i was looking at the stars. i noticed a object close to polaris and thought it may be a airplane because it was moving. i looked for the i.D. and strobe lights that are on all aircraft and could not see any. then it became very bright. it was brighter than the landing lights on any aircraft i have ever seen. i'm former air force and know what landing lights look like. after a few moments it started to dim to a reddish color before it faded out of sight. from my perspective it seemed to be heading towards the northwest but more north than west. i was so amazed by it that all i could do is watch. i couldn't even tell my girlfriend who was inside not 10 feet away.
content.summary: Bright star like object.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting from the uk. i live in surrey, which is under the flight path of heathrow airport, one of the busiest airports in the world. i also frequently see hellicopters flying to and fro from ascot race course, which is a famouse horse racing venue.
 i include this to varify that i know what an aeroplane looks like, and i know what a helicopter looks like, both in daylight and at night time.
 
 what i witnessed truely baffels my mind, i cannot, after much consideration, come up with a plausible explanation.

 i was standing at egham train station, at 11 59, on the 21st of march 2009, waiting for a train which was late (what else). in england we have street lights which are amber. i say this just to give some background.

 i happened to notice an amber light, which looked just like a street light, pass overhead. i observed this light maintained a straight course overhead, and noticed that it made no sound whatsoever.
 i continued to watch this light, which travelled on a straight course for no more than 20 seconds. which was enough time for it to get so far away that it became impossible to see. as it got further away, the amber light turned red. i put this down to the way light appears as it travels away, but am not sure what this phenonoma is called.
 i know estimating the distance of a light source is subjective at best, i would say that this object was at a height of no moore than 1000 feet, i would contend that it was even lower than that.
 this object was in the form of a globe of light, but this is difficult to determine because of my viewing perspective which was directly underneath.
 i have never, in all my thirty six years on this earth, seen anything like this. no photo's, sorry.
content.summary: Bright amber sphere, silent.
